comets
Class SpaceObject

java.lang.Object
  comets.SpaceObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comet, Ship, Shot
public abstract class SpaceObject
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the root of the hierarchy of objects that float in space. All of the game objects in Comets derive from this class.

Author:
you

Field Summary
static double playfieldHeight
          The size of the play area in the y direction
static double playfieldWidth
          The size of the play area in the x direction
protected  double xVelocity
          The rate at which the object is moving in the x direction
protected  double yVelocity
          The rate at which the object is moving in the y direction
 
Constructor Summary
SpaceObject(double xPos, double yPos, double xVel, double yVel, double radius)
          Creates a space object in the specified place, with the specified speed, and the specified size.

 double getRadius()

 void move()
          Updates the position of the object based on its velocity, and wraps it around to the other side of the play field if it goes off the edge.

Constructor Detail

SpaceObject

public SpaceObject(double xPos,
                   double yPos,
                   double xVel,
                   double yVel,
                   double radius)
Creates a space object in the specified place, with the specified speed, and the specified size.

Parameters:
xPos - The location of the object in the x direction
yPos - The location of the object in the y direction
xVel - The velocity of the object in the x direction
yVel - The velocity of the object in the y direction
radius - The distance from the center of the object to its outer edge
Method Detail

getRadius

public double getRadius()
Returns the size of the object.

Returns:
the object's radius

getXPosition

public double getXPosition()
Returns the position of the object in the x direction.

Returns:
the object's x position

getYPosition

public double getYPosition()
Returns the position of the object in the y direction.

Returns:
the object's y position

move

public void move()
Updates the position of the object based on its velocity, and wraps it around to the other side of the play field if it goes off the edge.

overlapping

public boolean overlapping(SpaceObject rhs)
Determines whether this object is overlapping with rhs.

Parameters:
rhs - The other object that we're comparing this one against
Returns:
true if the objects overlap and false otherwise
